entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 9:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -24.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:22 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
